channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: マイケル・コーエンがドナルド・トランプのNY裁判で記者との関係を証言、ジャーナリストと情報源の複雑な関係を示す（CNN's Reliable Sources）
item.description:
CNN's Reliable Sources:
Michael Cohen testifies about his ties to reporters during Donald Trump's NY trial, showing the complicated relationships journalists often have with sources  —  The Donald Trump hush money trial is dragging reporters into uncomfortable territory and laying bare the complicated relationships journalists often have with sources.

item.title: メカニカル・ライセンシング・コレクティブは、音楽とオーディオブックをバンドルしたスポティファイの最近のサブスクリプション・オファーは、ロイヤリティの低下を招くと訴えている（Jem Aswad/Variety）
item.description:
Jem Aswad / Variety:
In a lawsuit, the Mechanical Licensing Collective claims Spotify's recent subscription offers that bundle music and audiobooks would result in lower royalties  —  The lawsuit states that, beginning in March 2024, Spotify announced that its Premium Individual, Duo and Family subscription streaming plans …

item.title: 声優2人がAIスタートアップのLovo社を提訴、許可なく声の録音を違法に使用してクローン音声を作ったと主張、Lovo社は否定（Cade Metz/New York Times）
item.description:
Cade Metz / New York Times:
Two voice actors sue AI startup Lovo, saying it illegally used recordings of their voices to make audio clones without their permission; Lovo denies the claims  —  Two voice actors say an A.I. company created clones of their voices without their permission.  Now they're suing.

item.title: 情報源：多くのNPR職員が、NPRのジャーナリズムを公開する前にすべてチェックする新しい編集者層「バックストップ」に怒りや懸念を表明（Benjamin Mullin/New York Times）
item.description:
Benjamin Mullin / New York Times:
Sources: many NPR employees expressed anger or concern over the Backstop, a new layer of editors who will review all of NPR's journalism before it is released  —  Many employees have expressed concern that a new group of six editors called the Backstop will be unnecessary and slow down NPR's journalism.

item.title: カリフォルニア州上院歳出委員会が、アルファベット、メタ、アマゾンに手数料を課し、雇用税控除を通じてローカルニュースの費用を負担させる法案を承認（Steven Waldman/@stevenwaldman）
item.description:
Steven Waldman / @stevenwaldman:
The California Senate Appropriations Committee approves a bill imposing fees on Alphabet, Meta, and Amazon to pay for local news through employment tax credits  —  The California Senate Appropriations Committee minutes ago approved Sen. Glazer's bill to put a fee on Alphabet, Meta & Amazon to pay for reviving local news (through employment tax credits). 1st time such a fee would be dedicated to saving local news. https://www.rebuildlocalnews.org/ ...

item.title: バイデン＝ハリス陣営は、7月23日か8月13日に行われる副大統領討論会に参加するようCBS Newsからの招待を受ける（Erin Doherty/Axios）
item.description:
Erin Doherty / Axios:
The Biden-Harris campaign accepts an invitation from CBS News to participate in a vice presidential debate on July 23 or August 13  —  - “We look forward to the Trump campaign accepting one of these dates so that the full debate calendar for this campaign can be set,” the Biden campaign said.

item.title: メモ：ガネットは、AIが生成した要約を一部の記事の上部に追加し、下部に免責事項を表示する。USAトゥデイの一部の記事ではすでに要約が表示されている（Mia Sato/The Verge）
item.description:
Mia Sato / The Verge:
Memo: Gannett is adding AI-generated summaries to the top of some stories, with a disclaimer at the bottom; some USA Today stories already show the summaries  —  Gannett, the media company that owns hundreds of newspapers in the US, is launching a new program that adds AI-generated bullet points …

item.title: OpenAIとRedditが提携、RedditのData API経由でRedditのコンテンツをChatGPTなどに提供、Redditに新たなAIツールを導入、OpenAIをRedditの広告パートナーに（Arasu Kannagi Basil/Reuters）
item.description:
Arasu Kannagi Basil / Reuters:
OpenAI and Reddit partner to bring Reddit content to ChatGPT and more via Reddit's Data API, bring new AI tools to Reddit, and make OpenAI a Reddit ad partner  —  Reddit (RDDT.N) has partnered with OpenAI to bring the social media platform's content to popular chatbot ChatGPT …

item.title: ある配給会社はAIによる吹き替えを紹介し、映画『プーチン』はAIを使って俳優の体の上にプーチンの顔を再現した（The Hollywood Reporter）。
item.description:
The Hollywood Reporter:
AI in film is on display at Cannes, as one distributor showcases AI dubbing and the movie Putin uses AI to re-create Putin's face over the body of an actor  —  Despite the recent labor actions to combat it, Hollywood has already started using artificial intelligence, presenting the industry …

item.title: Meta、ThreadsでTweetDeckスタイルのカスタマイズ可能なフィードのテストを開始。
item.description:
Tom Warren / The Verge:
Meta starts testing TweetDeck-style customizable feeds on Threads that are stacked in a column interface on the web, available to selected users  —  Meta is starting to test a TweetDeck-like experience for Threads today.  It will allow Threads users to create customizable feeds that are stacked …

item.title: ソニー・ミュージック、700以上のAI企業、開発者、音楽ストリーミング・プラットフォームに書簡を送り、AI学習におけるソニーのコンテンツの「無断使用」を警告（Daniel Thomas/Financial Times）
item.description:
Daniel Thomas / Financial Times:
Sony Music sends letters to 700+ AI companies, developers, and music streaming platforms warning over the “unauthorized use” of Sony's content in training AI  —  Music group representing Adele and Beyoncé contacts more than 700 companies to prohibit use of content

item.title: TikTokは60分の動画をテストしており、メディア企業はテレビ番組の全エピソードを投稿できるようになり、TikTokはYouTubeとさらに直接競合することになる（Aisha Malik/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Aisha Malik / TechCrunch:
TikTok is testing 60-minute videos, which would let media companies post full TV show episodes and put TikTok in even more direct competition with YouTube  —  TikTok is testing the ability for users to upload 60-minute videos, the company confirmed to TechCrunch on Thursday.

item.title: スロバキアの閣僚やロバート・フィーコ首相の政治的盟友の中には、フィーコ首相の命を狙ったメディアを非難する者もいる（Lili Bayer/The Guardian）。
item.description:
Lili Bayer / The Guardian:
Some Slovakian ministers and political allies of Prime Minister Robert Fico blame the media for the attempt on Fico's life  —  Journalists voice concern after senior figures from ruling coalition blame independent outlets and opposition parties for incident

item.title: ディズニー、フォックス、WBDがスポーツ・ストリーミング・ベンチャーの名称を発表：2024年秋にデビュー予定の「Venu Sports」（Todd Spangler/Variety）
item.description:
Todd Spangler / Variety:
Disney, Fox, and WBD unveil the name of their sports streaming venture: Venu Sports, whose debut is planned for fall 2024  —  “We are excited to officially introduce Venu Sports, a brand that we feel captures the spirit of an all-new streaming home where sports fans outside …

item.title: NYの地方ニュース社に対する9,000万ドルの雇用税控除は、現在、上場テレビ・ラジオ会社と非営利ニュース社を除外している（Jon Campbell/Gothamist）
item.description:
Jon Campbell / Gothamist:
New York's $90M employment tax credit for local news outlets currently excludes publicly traded TV and radio companies as well as nonprofit news outlets  —  We rely on your support to make local news available to all  —  Make your contribution now and help Gothamist thrive in 2024.  Donate today
